chunk:
COSRX Triple Hyaluronic Moisture Ampoule

Brand: COSRX

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Methyl Gluceth-10, Sodium Hyaluronate, Carbomer, Panthenol, Tromethamine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Gluconolactone, Lactobionic Acid

ne, Lactobionic Acid

Directions: Apply two or three drops onto the face avoiding the eye and mouth area. Evenly spread and massage it for maximum absorption.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
